column2: I always love the baked goat cheese
column3: and the bacon wrapped dates are yummy!  Also really enjoyed the braised short ribs
column4: and lots of others looked fabulous.  Plus
column5: who doesn't love tiny desserts?  It's almost impossible to overindulge!!  But although tapas do make for a great time
column6: it's almost better when there are only 3 or 4 in your group and everyone can share.  We ended up ordering 2 or 3 dishes per couple
column7: so we didn't really get to diversify since each dish only feeds about 2 to 3.  But oh
column8: the sangria!  My favorite part of the meal.  Passionfruit? Yep.  Classic Red?  Pour me another.  Peach?  Refill at table 54
column9: por favor.  You just can't wrong with pitchers of these!
